showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ .  Stayed a week.  Nice large space with water and power (no sewer, but there is a dump station).  Very clean restroom and shower.  The water in one of the showers was scalding hot so be careful.  Lots of cholla so keep a close eye on pets.

‚Ä¶ sites were nice & large with a concrete  picnic table & fire pit, but the dirt underneath the gravel became a messy issue as it turned to mud. I didn't use the restrooms or shower facilities but my husband did & said they were clean & nice. ‚Ä¶
We camped at the Buckhorn Campground and it was lovely. Beautiful desert while it's not too hot. Good size spaces with fire grill. Very clean restrooms with shower. We'll be back

‚Ä¶ . All the desert plants abound. Tons of saguaros, chollas and more. Many different types of birds and wildlife. Lots of picnic spots. Gonna go camping there tomorrow night to view the meteor shower. Very nice people who work there too.

Nice location but dirty facilities. Moldy shower curtains. Soap dispensers fall off the walls. Had a terrifying run in with other campers that approached my children very late in the dark, supposedly looking for their dog. No one got much ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and visited lots of attractions in Phoenix.  I chose this campground because of its proximity to the zoo and Goldfield Ghost Town and Pueblo Grande... and because it has showers.  The campground exceeded my expectations in every way. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ area! Day use area is great but combinded with the campground its amazing! Huge, private sites that are well maintained. Shout out to the camp hosts! They clean the restrooms/shower rooms daily and can be seen working throughout the day.

We've stayed one night, and this is the cleanest public campground I've ever stayed.  I wonder if the campground as recently built?  Bathroom was spot less and shower was very nice.  There were nice walking trails all around the area.

This Park feels like you're far away from everything, but you're not. Forget something Bash's is right down the street.
Hiking and bike trails. Bathroom shower available.
